p: The SARIMA method discovered the injected outbreaks faster than EARS did, at any FAR below 10% (compare EARS (open black symbols) to SARIMA (closed red symbols) for the s17 ( Fig 2A) or the s33 backgrounds ( Fig 2B)). The timeliness advantage of SARIMA over EARS became increasingly pronounced at FARs below 2%, where real-world surveillance systems would be expected to operate.
